name: pro3
description: **Weather Journal** is the third project of Udacity [Front End Web Developer](https://www.udacity.com/course/front-end-web-developer-nanodegree--nd0011) nanodegree program. It requires to build a single-page JavaScript app which creates a weather record for user based on their input and data from [OpenWeatherMap API](https://openweathermap.org/api).
author: Afifa
